Sell my Business

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.65) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65)” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/sell-my-business-header.jpg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code admin_label=”Empty Spacer” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Text Centered – with Flag” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#F0F0F0″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Flag Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/hero-flag.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”75px||75px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” header_2_line_height=”1.28em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”780px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We’ll show you the way

As the largest broker in the funeral industry, we’ve helped thousands of funeral home and cemetery professionals maximize the value of their businesses by connecting well-prepared sellers with quality buyers for the best possible results. Owners who sell with JCG experience 7-10% more in value than those who sell direct. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Main Content” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||0px||false|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Simple Text Blocks” _builder_version=”4.16″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_line_height=”2.1em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Maximizing the return on your hard work

You’ve worked hard to build your funeral home and cemetery business into the valuable asset it’s become today. We respect that. That’s why we work equally hard to deliver value throughout every step of the selling process. With Johnson Consulting Group at your side, you can rest assured that the valuation, marketing, and selling of your business will yield maximum results.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Bullet Points” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Orange Bullets” module_class=”orange_arrows” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ link_font=”||||on||||” ul_font_size=”16px” ul_line_height=”1.7em” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||-45px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Maximize the value of your business
  • Ensure that the legacy you created is preserved
  • Create quality custom marketing packages that increase enterprise value and bring buyers to the table quickly
  • Establish a sale structure that provides the best tax advantages for you
  • Reduce disruption to your business as you navigate go through the process
  • Ensure confidentiality using a structured process
  • Maintain due diligence with a quick and seamless process from start to finish including weekly check-ins
  • We earn more for our clients…Period! The increase in value covers our cost, guaranteed.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Blurb” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||0px||false|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Our Impact by the Numbers” image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/two-billion-sales.png” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”70px” content_max_width=”100%” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ header_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”2.1em” background_color=”#F0F0F0″ image_icon_custom_padding_tablet=”” image_icon_custom_padding_phone=”” image_icon_custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” animation=”off” border_width_right_image=”1px” border_color_right_image=”#cc7022″ border_color_bottom_image=”#cc7022″ border_width_all_image_tablet=”” border_width_all_image_phone=”” border_width_all_image_last_edited=”on|phone” border_width_right_image_tablet=”” border_width_right_image_phone=”0px” border_width_right_image_last_edited=”on|phone” border_width_bottom_image_tablet=”” border_width_bottom_image_phone=”1px” border_width_bottom_image_last_edited=”on|phone” image_max_width=”70px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Since 1997, we’re proud to have negotiated more than 1,000 contracts and over $2.5 Billion in closed transactions.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Seven Step Process” _builder_version=”4.16″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_slider disabled_on=”on|on|on” admin_label=”Sliders” _builder_version=”4.16″ disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_slide heading=”Step 1: Exploratory & Engagement Phase” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/exploratory-and-engagement-3.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

We take the time to understand what succession looks like for our funeral and cemetery clients. We also clearly communicate how our process works before finalizing an engagement so that both parties understand their roles and responsibilities.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading=”Step 2: Information Gathering Phase” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/information-gathering-2.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

We drill down to the core of your business and identify what will interest potential buyers in order to create a compelling sales story. We collect data on current contracts, market trends, strategic plans, employee resources, future profitability, and much more.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading=”Step 3: Valuation Phase” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/valuation.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

Our experienced financial analysts provide a detailed analysis of your company’s current and historical financial trends. This allows us to compare your business against competitors in the market and highlight opportunities for improvement that can increase the likelihood of a quick sale.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading=”Step 4: Potential Buyer Review Phase” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/buyer-review.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

Evaluating a buyer is an important step in the sales process. JCG maintains an extensive database of potential buyers and we assess each purchaser’s financial claims and professional qualifications as necessary. Selling a business isn’t just about exchanging money — the deal needs to be well-structured and the buyer should demonstrate the capability to successfully manage the business for the long term. 

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading=”Step 5: Marketing Package & LOI Phase” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/marketing-and-loi.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

Marketing strategy can make or break the sale of a funeral home or cemetery business. Our team creates custom, high-quality marketing packages that contain all the information needed to make a decision, which brings buyers to the table faster. Only buyers who accept our confidentiality requirements can review the package — if they show interest, we provide additional data in a sales memorandum and request a Letter of Intent (LOI) before moving forward.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading=”Step 6: Negotiation & Acceptance Phase” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/negotiation.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

This is where thorough planning and preparation come into play. We understand how to evaluate an offer from a prospect, examine the terms and conditions, and discern between similar proposals from multiple buyers. Our goal is to help you negotiate maximum value for your business because we know it’s not only about what you get, but what you keep. 

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading=”Step 7: Due Diligence & Closing Phase” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/due-diligence-and-closing.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

The closing phase involves making sure both parties are satisfied with the final agreement, and that lines of communication remain open to ensure a smooth transition. JCG coordinates, manages, and oversees the due diligence process with all attorneys and third-party inspectors. We also secure all confidential materials and assist with contract revisions to ensure a successful closing.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Team Bios” _builder_version=”4.16″ da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” disabled_on=”on|on|on” disabled=”on” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”20px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Meet our Mergers and Acquisitions team

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_team_member name=”Karen McCurdy” position=”Director of JCG Succession Services” image_url=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/karen-mccurdy-photo-round.png” admin_label=”karen-mccurdy” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#cc7022″ header_font_size=”14px” position_text_color=”#4E4E50″ position_font_size=”13px” text_orientation=”center” link_option_url=”#karen-mcCurdy” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A word from our clients

I contacted JCG after my husband, who managed and operated our funeral home, suffered a fatal heart attack. I needed to sell the business ASAP and had no clue where to start. I do not work in the funeral business and was in no way prepared to run or sell the business – I was terrified. Johnson Consulting reassured me that with their help, the business would sell. And they kept their word – it sold! They were incredibly patient with me and thoroughly explained the process. I worked mostly with Karen; she was professional, highly competent and always kept me in the loop with updates. She did a tremendous amount of work, stayed with me when I was anxious and stayed on me when I got lazy! When things got heated, Karen kept her cool. I didn’t have to worry about anything slipping through the cracks, as she was on top of everything all of the time! I highly recommend Johnson Consulting if you are thinking about selling (or buying) a funeral home. The price I paid was more than fair and they went above and beyond for me.

– Suzanne Miller

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”CTA with Background Image – Global” _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/services-cta-bg.jpg” background_color_gradient_stops_tablet=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 100%” background_color_gradient_stops_phone=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 100%” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” saved_tabs=”all” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/icon-conversation.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” width=”780px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let’s start the conversation

With a clear understanding of where the profession has been, and a compelling vision of where it’s going, we help our clients reach new levels of success. Let’s talk about how we can do the same for you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQ0ODgifX0=@” button_text=”Get In Touch” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#cc7022″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”Bitter||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #karen-mccurdy” module_id=”karen-mccurdy” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”karen-mccurdy” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/karen-mccurdy-photo-round.png” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Karen McCurdy

Director of JCG Succession Services

Karen McCurdy is a graduate of Florida State University (1991), she received a Bachelor of Science in Real Estate. Upon graduation, Karen began a career in appraising both commercial and residential properties. She continues to maintain her real estate broker’s license and State Certified General Appraiser License. After appraising for 3 ½ years, Karen accepted a position with the Florida Department of Environmental Protection as an Appraiser Specialist. She reviewed statewide appraisals related to the acquisition, sale, lease and disposition of all real property. In addition, she performed desk and field reviews of proposed properties for state acquisition.

In May 1996, Karen began a career with Thomas-Pierce & Company as a Project Manager. In 1999, she was promoted to Sr. Financial Analyst. Some of her responsibilities include evaluating the operating and financial performance of client companies, assisting in negotiating the sales of client businesses and working through client transactions. Karen enjoys the challenge of working with the diversities of each business and assisting each client in meeting his or her individual needs.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #al-asta” module_id=”al-asta” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”al-asta” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/al-asta.jpg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Al Asta

Senior Business Consultant

Al graduated from Cypress College of Mortuary Science in January of 1982. A Summa Cum Laude graduate, he was also Valedictorian of his class. He began his career with Whitney & Murphy Funeral Home, a large volume funeral home in Phoenix, AZ. In 1984 Al was involved in a Forethought Life Insurance pilot program as a sales agent.  In this role he developed sales materials, phone scripts, training materials and product development. After approximately one year in working on that project, Al was named Manager of Whitney & Murphy. After a successful tenure at the funeral home, Al was promoted to General Manager of Prime Succession Inc. Phoenix, Arizona operations, which soon grew to include the company’s operations in Texas, Iowa, Nebraska and Arkansas. In 2000, Al was promoted to Regional Vice-President, with diverse and varied corporate responsibilities. Al’s experience leading businesses through rapid growth and transition as well as difficult financial times will allow him to relate to our client’s challenges, regardless of their nature. Even during the toughest financial periods, Al’s region maintained morale, quality of service and profitability. Al’s experience managing multiple locations and supervising location managers, along with his practical experience as a licensed funeral director make him a very productive operational consultant to both large and small volume single and multiple location firms.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #nicholas-brown” module_id=”nicholas-brown” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”nicholas-brown” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Nick_Brown_Headshot-BW.png” alt=”Nick Brown” title_text=”Nick_Brown_Headshot (B&W)” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Nicholas Brown

Financial Analyst/Project Manager

Nicholas joins the Johnson Consulting Group with more than 10 years of advisory, corporate finance, and mergers & acquisition experience. His education includes a Master of Business Administration from the University of Florida and a Master of Public Administration from the University of Southern California. Nicholas also holds the Certified Business Intermediary designation from the International Business Brokers Association. He enjoys working closely with his clients to source investment opportunities and facilitate fair, equitable deals.

When Nicholas is not working, he enjoys traveling, cooking, and watching/playing sports.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #simon-wong” module_id=”simon-wong” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”simon-wong” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/simon-wong-photo-round.png” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Simon Wong

Financial Analyst

Simon graduated from Arizona State University with a Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting. After graduation, he worked at a student loan company as a staff accountant preparing financial documents. Thereafter, Simon worked at an insurance brokerage as a staff accountant preparing financial statements and reviewing an assortment of accounting procedures. Simon’s prior accounting experience and analytic abilities supports his role as a Financial Analyst at Johnson Consulting Group. Simon enjoys bicycling, hiking and listening to music in his free time.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #michael-yates” module_id=”michael-yates” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”michael-yates” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.24.0″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/michael-yates-photo-round.png” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Michael Yates

Financial Planning and Analysis Manager

Michael graduated from Arizona State University with a Bachelors in Finance with a minor in Political Science. During college Michael worked at a start-up software company that developed financial compliance software for cash intensive businesses. In his spare time Michael enjoys watching and talking about sports and relaxing at home.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #dave-adams” module_id=”dave-adams” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”dave-adams” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/dave-adams-website.jpg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dave Adams

Senior Business Development Consultant

David graduated from Southern Illinois University in 1977 with a B.S. degree in Mortuary Science and later a Masters in Accounting and Finance at Rice University. He served as a partner/licensed Funeral Director/Embalmer/Coroner at his firm in Southern Illinois for over 10 years before selling to his partner. In 1984 he joined Batesville Casket Company, a leading manufacturer of burial and cremation products. During his 25+ year tenure with Batesville, he served in a variety of sales and senior management positions, the last being Vice President of all National Accounts, Key Accounts and the International markets with offices in Australia, England, South Africa and the Philippines. These roles enabled him to gain experience, knowledge and in-depth understanding of sales and merchandising strategies, industry demographics, and the complexity of the changing funeral industry market. David also gained invaluable experience by serving as the Vice President of Sales and Marketing at a leading funeral/cemetery complex in the Greater San Francisco Bay area. Just prior to joining Johnson Consulting, David expanded his professional resume by serving as the Director of Corporate Development for Carriage Services, a publicly traded acquisition company. Throughout his career, David has gained extensive knowledge and diverse experience with all aspects of the death care industry.

​

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #Wes-Brimley” module_id=”wes-brimley” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”wes-brimley” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Wes-B..png” alt=”Wes B.” title_text=”Wes B.” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text module_id=”Wes-Brimley” _builder_version=”4.16″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Wes Brimley

M&A Consultant

Wes graduated with a degree in Finance and International Business with high honors from the W.P. Carrey School of Business at ASU.  He started his career at Johnson Consulting Group in 2012 as a Business / Finance Analyst helping our clients understand their financial position and strategized with them to improve customer satisfaction, operational efficiency, and profitability.  After 3 years with Johnson Consulting Group, Wes moved into corporate FP&A for Insight, a large technology company, helping them optimize and expand their top line earnings, while working to minimize overhead costs.  He became proficient in P&L analysis and built customized tools to help internal clients understand the business in a clear and simple way.  Wes was responsible for the strategizing and goal setting for approximately 1 billion in revenue to the company and was the finance liaison for 17 managers 3 directors and 1 SVP of sales.  After 2 years in the corporate FP&A world, he moved into a management role at Spear Education, a continuing education company for dentists and their staff.  He was the primary finance manager for their consulting division and worked hard to implement best practice solutions for both their internal and external clients.  Wes rejoined the Johnson Consulting team in 2021 after spending some time being a new father, and brings his many years of financial, management and consulting experience with him.  He is a critical thinker who works hard to help our clients be successful operating their businesses efficiently and divesting them for top value.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #bob-ekins” module_id=”bob-ekins” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”bob-ekins” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/bob-ekins-round.jpg” title_text=”bob-ekins-round” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Bob Ekins

Director of Business Development

Bob joined Johnson Consulting after 20 years of experience with three of the industry’s leading companies. After graduating from Spring Hill College in Mobile Alabama with a Business Management degree, Bob began his funeral service career with Batesville Casket Company. His roles included sales territory responsibility, national accounts, cremation specialist and selection room design including merchandising. In 2002, Bob joined Forethought Financial Services as Director of Business Development. His responsibilities included assisting funeral home and cemetery owners with solutions for existing trust funds and new pre-need insurance business. The role evolved into client relations with multiple marketing partners across the country. In 2011, Bob was named Vice President of Sales for Trust 100, the oldest and one of the largest marketing partners to assist client funeral homes with Advance Funeral Planning. These career experiences have made Bob the ideal asset for Johnson Consulting Group to be responsible for client relations and business development.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #Alexis-Tudor” module_id=”Alexis-Tudor” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”Alexis-Tudor” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/Alexis-Tudor.png” alt=”Alexis Tudor” title_text=”Alexis Tudor” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Alexis Tudor

Financial Analyst/Project Manager

Alexis graduated with honors from California State University Long Beach with a Bachelor’s in Finance. After graduation she began her career in the municipal bonds industry where she acted as the sole financial analyst for the largest bond issuer in California. She later moved on to corporate FP&A where she gained valuable expertise working with an international team.

Alexis enjoys working with complex data sets to support customer success and drive financial performance. She also loves interacting with others and making connections.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #jessica-atwood” module_id=”jessica-atwood” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”jessica-atwood” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Atwood.png” alt=”Jessica Atwood” title_text=”Atwood” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Jessica Atwood

Financial Analyst/Project Manager

Jessica is a Certified Public Accountant (CPA) with over 10 years of combined experience in M&A, taxation, financial analysis, and estate planning. She holds a Bachelor’s in Accounting and a Master of Accountancy from the Darla Moore School of Business at the University of South Carolina. She also earned a Master of Science in Family Financial Planning and Counseling from the University of Alabama.

 While not at work, Jessica enjoys happy hours, traveling, hanging out with her retired greyhounds, and playing MMOs with friends from across the globe.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: Sell my BusinessWe’ll show you the way As the largest broker in the funeral industry, we’ve helped thousands of funeral home and cemetery professionals maximize the value of their businesses by connecting well-prepared sellers with quality buyers for the best possible results. Owners who sell with JCG experience 7-10% more in value than those who […]
